PROPERTIES.name: routageBandeau
PROPERTIES.InnerHTML: <INPUT id=_zzToken_ type=hidden value=true name=_zzToken_> <INPUT type=hidden name=contexte> <INPUT type=hidden name=numeroRelation> <INPUT type=hidden name=typeRelation> <INPUT type=hidden name=navigation>
PROPERTIES.OuterHTML: <FORM onsubmit="return zzValidateFormWithTokenActivateroutageBandeau(this);" method=post name=routageBandeau action=Routage><INPUT id=_zzToken_ type=hidden value=true name=_zzToken_> <INPUT type=hidden name=contexte> <INPUT type=hidden name=numeroRelation> <INPUT type=hidden name=typeRelation> <INPUT type=hidden name=navigation> </FORM>

PROPERTIES.InnerHTML:
<META content=text/css http-equiv=Content-Style-Type>
<SCRIPT language=Javascript>
	var contextPathACW1 = "/WebAneto";
</SCRIPT>

<SCRIPT language=JavaScript src="/Commun/js/disabled.js"></SCRIPT>

<SCRIPT language=JavaScript src="/WebAneto/jsp/contrat/js/ACW1.js"></SCRIPT>
<LINK rel=stylesheet type=text/css href="/Commun/style/disabled.css"><LINK rel=stylesheet type=text/css href="/Commun/style/Soltim.css">
<SCRIPT language=javascript>
function invalidateZZToken(form) {
if(form!= null && form._zzToken_ != null){
form._zzToken_.value = false;
}
zzDisableHref('true');
}
function isZZTokenValid(form) {
if(form!= null && form._zzToken_ != null){
var tokenValue = form._zzToken_.value;
if (tokenValue == 'true') {
return true;
}
}
else return true;
return false;
}
function zzSubmitForm(form) {
if(isZZTokenValid(form)){
if(!pageIsReloaded){
invalidateZZToken(form);
}else{
pageIsReloaded = false;
}
form.submit();
}
}
function zzValidateFormWithTokenActivateroutage(form){
if(isZZTokenValid(form) && zzPersonnalOnsubmitroutage() ){
invalidateZZToken(form);
return true;
}
return false;
}
function zzPersonnalOnsubmitroutage(form) {

 return true;
}
</SCRIPT>

<FORM onsubmit="return zzValidateFormWithTokenActivateroutage(this);" method=post name=routage action=Routage><INPUT id=_zzToken_ type=hidden value=true name=_zzToken_> <INPUT type=hidden value=Routage name=task> <INPUT type=hidden name=contexte> <INPUT type=hidden name=numeroRelation> <INPUT type=hidden name=typeRelation> <INPUT type=hidden name=defaultView> </FORM>
<SCRIPT type=text/javascript>var pageIsReloaded = true;</SCRIPT>

PROPERTIES.name: routage
PROPERTIES.InnerHTML: <INPUT id=_zzToken_ type=hidden value=true name=_zzToken_> <INPUT type=hidden value=Routage name=task> <INPUT type=hidden name=contexte> <INPUT type=hidden name=numeroRelation> <INPUT type=hidden name=typeRelation> <INPUT type=hidden name=defaultView>
PROPERTIES.OuterHTML: <FORM onsubmit="return zzValidateFormWithTokenActivateroutage(this);" method=post name=routage action=Routage><INPUT id=_zzToken_ type=hidden value=true name=_zzToken_> <INPUT type=hidden value=Routage name=task> <INPUT type=hidden name=contexte> <INPUT type=hidden name=numeroRelation> <INPUT type=hidden name=typeRelation> <INPUT type=hidden name=defaultView> </FORM>
